title: Login Failed-Invalid Credentials
description: Customer reports login failing even with correct username and password.

title: Payment Failed-Card Declined
description: Customer attempted to pay using Visa ending 1234 but the payment keeps failing despite sufficient balance.

title: Password Reset Not Working
description: User requested password reset but did not receive the reset email.

title: Mobile App Crashes
description: The app crashes immediately after launch on Android 12 devices.

title: Email Notifications Not Received
description: Customer not receiving daily notification emails since last update.

title: Billing Amount Incorrect
description: Customer invoice shows wrong total after applying discount coupon.

title: Website Slow
description: Homepage loading takes more than 15 seconds.

title: Feature Request-Dark Mode
description: Customer requested a dark mode option in application settings.

title: Account Suspended by Mistake
description: User account has been flagged and suspended wrongly by system.

title: UI Alignment Issue
description: Buttons overlapping on Safari browser in checkout page.
